string.text: Dieser Bereich ist gesperrt ... was willst du, Stalker?!
Komm schon! Ich muss hier durch... Kannst du da nicht was machen ... oder so?

Oder so ...,? Weißt du eigentlich, was die da oben - mir zahlen, für all das hier? Wie soll ich über die Runden kommen? \n \nPass auf - das mit dem Geld vergessen wir. Dafür kostet dich der Durchgang eine Flasche Wodka und das auch nur einmal während ich des Tages meine Wache schiebe.
Was solls - hier ist dein Alkohol.

Hör zu... Wir stellen uns vor, dass es hier nur Mücken und Fliegen gibt. ...Ach guck - den Franz da drüben, den hat's gestochen... Alles darüber hinaus was passiert hast du zu verantworten. kapisch?! - .. eh Franz alles klar .. und nun verschwinde.
Na los, mach die Flatter und bleib erstmal nicht stehen, bevor ich meine meinung ändere ...
Ich fürchte, ich habe gar nichts im moment...

tja! .. Dann, dreh um. Wenn du genug bei dir hast, dann kannst du ja wiederkommen. Und versuch es erst gar nicht, dich an uns vorbeizuschleichen. Denn, dann sind wir gezwungen auf dich zu schiessen. Absprachen hin oder her.
Verschwinde von hier, Penner. Sonst helfen wir nach.
Was ist denn los?
Hi. Was brauchst du?
Wolf will mit dir sprechen ... Willkommen bist du hier deshalb noch lange nicht. Beweg dich und mach kein Scheiß ... oder du wirst es bereuen..
Hallo, Bruder ... was so Los?
Ich muss zum Doktor .. weißt du wo der zurzeit ist?
Gezeichneter... Hast du was gefunden?
Gezeichneter... und .. hast du was mitgebracht?
Ja, hier die "Groza". Und, was wolltest du mir erzahlen?
Nein, hab noch nichts gefunden.
Yes, but you will not give up ... I think to myself amiss ...

Just what I needed... a good weapon .. thanks!! .. Now, listen up...\nThe Doctor from Strelok's group is waiting for you. If you are who you say you are, then you already know where he is..\nThere is a more direct path to Agroprom from here .. go across the road, past the farm, just past the railway tunnel, you will see two large boulders - just beyond them is a path directly to Agroprom. It will take you to a gate in the far end of a field just south of the Institute .. not far from the Catacombs .. Good Luck!!!
Then... go meet with the Doctor...
Find it first .. then we'll talk..
You greedy Bastard .. you'll get yours .. you just wait, and see!!
Everybody needs something, here in the Zone... My weapon is damaged, and completely useless... Bring me a Groza assault rifle, then we'll talk.. I may have some useful information for you...
A Groza ... got it .. I'll see what I can do..
I'm busy .. come back later..
Well now .. What exactly do you know about the Doctor!?
Ghost sent me .. I need to speak with the Doctor. It's urgent!!
Well, why didn't you say so!! The Doctor is camping out in Strelok's hiding place. If you really are who you claim to be, then you probably know where that is already...
Thank you..
Hello, Brother...
Aah, it's you .. speak of the Devil!!
Fuck you...
Yes, the Groza .. here, take it .. now, what did you want to talk to me about?

Just what I needed... a good weapon .. thanks!! .. Now, listen up...\nThe Doctor from Strelok's group is waiting for you. If you are who you say you are, then you already know where he is..\nThere is a more direct path to Agroprom from here .. go across the road, past the farm, just past the railway tunnel, you will see two large boulders - just beyond them is a path directly to Agroprom. It will take you to a gate in the far end of a field just south of the Institute .. not far from the Catacombs .. Good Luck!!!
Thank you, Sir...
Kannst du mir mehr über diesen Ort erzählen?

Dies ist eine Straße in der Zone. Wenn ich du wäre, würde ich nicht zu nahe an den Armeeposten gehen oder mich von den Soldaten entdecken lassen: die haben den Befehl, bei Sichtkontakt zu schießen. Und die Hubschrauberpiloten haben wohl zu viele Kriegs-Filme gesehen. Sie bügeln die Fläche vor dem Blockposten mit Maschinengewehr-Feuer einfach aus Langerweile aus. Weiter im Norden ist eine eingestürzte Brücke, aber die haben auch dort einen Posten aufgestellt. Mit denen kann man reden aber verscherz es dir nicht. Im offenen Gelände wimmelt es vor Wildhunden, für Anfänger ist das also nichts. Ach, und ein Rudel Mutanten taucht auch hin und wieder auf.
Was ist mit den Soldaten an der Brücke? Ich muss irgendwie an ihnen vorbei kommen.

Mal sehen.. du hast zwei Möglichkeiten. Wenn "Kuznetsov" Wache schiebt, dann solltest du daran denken, dass er gern einen bechert. Die Chancen stehen dann nicht schlecht, dass du ihn schmieren kannst. Aber... wenn du kein Alkohol bei dir hast, oder jemand anderes Wache schiebt hast du schlechte Karten. Es gäbe da noch einen anderen Weg. Gehe von hier aus rechts an der alten Farm vorbei. Richtung Eisenbahnschienen. Achte nur drauf, dass sie dich nicht sehen! Du kommst dann zu einem kleinen Tunnel, der durch die Deiche führt. Allerdings solltest du nicht ungeschütz dort reingehen. In dem Tunnel wütet eine grosse Elektro Anomlie ... sei Vorsichtig. Oh... und es wurden von Stalkern dort auch Zombies gesehen. Viel Glück
Was befindet sich weiter von hier aus im Norden, dort oben hinter dem Armeeposten?

Die Müllhalde. Das ist wirklich ein deprimierender Ort. So viel kontaminierte Scheiße das selbst die Pisse im Dunkeln Leuchtet. Sorry ... aber dort würde ich nicht lang bleiben wollen wenn ich du wäre.
Hello. Wolf has already sent word of you. Any questions?
How many Bandits are there in the factory?

Seven .. maybe eight .. two by the gate, two more in the building to the right where the fire barrel burns, and another two or more in the large buildings to the left - We think that's where they've got Nimble .. Usually, there's someone hanging around in the courtyard as well. That's about it. Shall we do this thing?!
Let's go. Round up your men.
We'd make too much noise as a group .. I'll go in alone..
Fine .. if you think you can handle it by yourself .. see you in hell, Marked One!!
Well, that takes care of that!! .. Wolf is going to be very happy about this!!
There's more of 'em! Find the bastards and take them down!!
Remind me not to mess with you .. I wouldn't have believed that, had I not seen it with my own eyes!! Say, maybe you can do me a small favour?
Hello, Marked One...
So, where are the piles of fallen enemies!? Piss Off!!
Sorry, but I can't talk now .. I'm waiting for someone...
I've got a couple of questions...
Make it quick then...
What can you tell me about the Zone?

That's all you wanna know? Look, I'm kinda busy right now. Here are the basics, and then you're on your own. About three kilometers North of here, you'll find the Dump. That's the place they used to dump all the radioactive waste from the NPP. Very high radiation levels, and anomalies all over the place. There are lots of Artefacts to be found there .. at least, there used to be.. Watch out for the gangs of Bandits, and for christ's sake don't piss off the Duty patrols .. they don't take kindly to shit disturbers!! West of the Dump, is the former Agroprom Research Institute, which is crawling with Military morons. To the East is the Dark Valley .. a pretty weird place. Quiet for the most part, but lots of Bandits roaming around. I've got a feeling there's more going on there than meets the eye .. Finally, there's the old Rostok factory just beyond the Dump. That would be where Duty have set up their Base. there is a Bar there .. the 100*Rads You'll find lots of interesting folks hanging around in that place. They can tell you more about what goes on further North...
Nevermind then..
Thanks .. now you've got my attention..
Sidorovich sent me to help you .. he said that you might know something about a guy named Strelok?!

I can't say I know him personally .. we've never actually met. We did communicate once though: my guys took some shots at him from a distance once. No one got hurt - it was clear his party had been waiting for someone else, so we parted our ways in peace .. Told each other off by shouting accross a ravinea, then went on our separate ways. Seriy, my brother, is located at the old railway garage in the Dump - I'll input his coordinates into your PDA .. you two should have a chat. He knows more about Strelok than I do. Go see him .. tell him I said hello .. Before you go .. I've got a few mutants on my tail, and it doesn't look like they've given up yet. You mind helping me deal with them? I'll make it worth your while...
Thanks for the info .. much appreciated..
Can you spare a medkit? .. I'm all out..
Sure .. here you are...
I'm all out .. sorry..
Nice work, Marked One .. you're a pretty decent shot .. Here, take this as a token of my appreciation...
Thanks a lot...
Wolf wants to speak with you .. But, that doesn't make you any more welcome .. Keep moving..
Geh weiter! Im Moment wird niemand im Lager mit dir sprechen.
Why?! .. what did I do...

You were pulled out of the wreckage of one of the Death Trucks by the Astrologer.. everybody suspects there might be something wrong with you .. you've got to prove that you can be trusted first .. now Piss Off!!
Death Truck!? What the hell are you talking about?!

The trucks that remove all the messed up shit, and corruption from the center of the Zone .. including Zombies .. former Stalkers who ventured too far into the Zone .. that's how they come out .. 'Dead' .. and you, my friend, were among them .. so, it's up to you to explain what the hell that's all about!!
What can I do to make you people trust me?!

Sidorovich, our local Trader wants you to see the Doctor .. do what he tells you to .. that's the only way .. he'll want you to pass some sort of test .. we've all done it .. go see him .. he's waiting for you .. in the Radio Room .. underground..
Okay then .. fine .. have it your way...
Hello, Marked One. What do you want?
Listen up, Marked One .. we could really use some help..
I'm listening..

My name is Fanatic.. I'm filling Wolf's shoes at the moment. A few Mercs came by here yesterday... and they were some tough bastards, let me tell you. They were making some pretty serious demands - You've got one day to clear this place out .. we're setting up camp here now .. it's going to be our new Base. Tonight they're coming back, and as you can imagine, they won't be in the mood for a chat this time around!!
So, what are you going to do?

We're gonna set up an ambush .. A full frontal attack would probably be the end of us. We're going to setup inside these houses, and make it look like we've all left, just as they told us to .. then .. when the right moment comes, we will attack. Someone like you is just the thing we could use right now. And we'd make sure to thank you properly after it's all over. You know we're good for it! So, what do you say?! .. will you help us .. please!!
Okay.. but, the reward had better be worth it!!

Let's spend the rest of the time preparing for the fight. Here's the plan: I'll put the most hopeless rookies in houses and basements and tell them not to make a move - otherwise they might just slaughter our own troops. You and me and a couple other decent shots will take the best positions to have an eye on the area around the fire. As soon as they come close to the fire, we let the bullets fly from everywhere! They'll be coming from the bridge... and I don't think we'll have to wait long. So, find yourself a hiding place with a view, then wait for my command. Take a look around, but remember that your odds aren't as good in the open. It's your call.
Great..
Not interested .. Sorry..
That's a shame. We could really use a fighter like you. I guess we'll have to do it on our own...
Waiting for these Boy Scouts. I have a gut feeling that they are not too far away..
Remind me not to mess with you in the future .. that was quite something!!
Yeah, something like that..

Here, take this as a reward\nA Soldier once shared this Artefact Modification Recipe with me: Elder Beads ... and also .. from myself, I offer you this information: not far from Sidorovich's bunker, there is a transition to the Swamps look closely, and you will find it ... I've input both pieces of information into your PDA .. Oh, and one more thing...\nDo you know about teleports?! I know how to set up such a thing .. it will take you directly where you want to go!!!
Marked One!! .. Good to see you again!!
Hello, to you as well!!
By the way, where did Wolf go?

He received some important information from a passing Stalker... He packed up his things, grabbed a box of dynamite, and hen took off, heading North. He asked me to look after things here in the Village for him .. in case he returns...
I have some questions...
Go ahead, I'll try to help..
Thank you.
What do you know about the Zone?
I know many things. Be more specific.
What's at the center of the Zone?

I've been searching for the answer to that very question myself!! I still haven't found a way to get through to the center, at least not a safe one, that is .. I led a small Group that tried to break through a couple of times. I barely made it back alive, and as for the rest of the Group .. well, some made it, and some didn't ... We were chasing our dreams, trying to make them come true ..
What do you mean?!

The Wish Granter .. It is said, that at the Center of the Zone .. there is a place where Dreams can come true, anything you wish for, no matter how strange or bizarre it may seem .. I used to believe the stories .. but, after seeing so many die trying to reach it .. and so many lives ruined because of it .. I don't believe the stories anymore .. and neither should you .. if you know what's good for you ...
How did this all come to be in the first place?!

There was another, more serious incident here in 2006. That's when it all started. Strange occurences .. mutants, anomalies .. artefacts .. the Military got involved, and the Scientists .. Those freaks from the Initiative showed up .. and those other people .. the ones all in Black .. they headed North .. straight into it all .. Good riddance!! All this Crap you see now that is killing us .. keeping us here like prisoners of the Zone .. it's all because of them!! Very few people know the whole truth .. and most of the people who were around then, six years ago are now either dead, or gone missing..
What brought you, here to the Zone?

I used to work in a mine down South before they closed it down. I had no money, and nothing to look forward to. Then I heard some rumors about the fabulous riches hidden inside the Zone. I had some tracking experience under my belt, so I thought; What the hell?. Can't say that I've become rich, but some cash has certainly come my way, that's for sure .. My story is pretty typical; most of us that are still around got here pretty much the same way .. for the same reasons...
What's the most dangerous thing in the Zone?

That's a tough question to answer .. I got one toe bitten off, my hair is falling out from the radiation, and half my mind is missing from getting too close to the center... Things there are real bad .. be careful up there!! Another time I happened to come face to face with a Bloodsucker - there's a meeting I wish I could forget. take those bastards out as soon as you see them!! Grenades work best, if you've got them!! .. make sure to always have some on you .. it will save your life .. trust me .. I know from experience. So, we can talk all day if you like, but until you've seen it for yourself, you will never truly know .. The best advice I can give you, is to be very careful - everywhere and always .. and don't piss people off ... they won't forget you .. and they will seek revenge ...
Have you ever heard of someone called Strelok?

I seem to remember the name, somehow .. Never actually met him. I haven't been too far North in a while, and all we get down here these days are the Rookies .. it's pretty safe around here, you see .. unless someone stirs up the Military .. that's when things get interesting. I'm lucky to have survived this long!! You should find someone who hangs out deep in the Zone and have a chat with them .. they might know more about this Strelok person you are looking for...
What can you tell me about the Death Trucks?!

I know about your situation. The Doctor told me while you were asleep .. Too much mysticism about it all for me .. I've never heard of anyone ever been found alive on one of those things before .. Consider yourself lucky that nobody has decided to put a bullet in your head already .. just in case you might turn on us .. become one of those Zombie freaks we see staggering in from the North-West .. the Yantar region is just crawling with mindless Stalkers... and they just keep coming ...
What can I do for you?
I'm looking for Nimble .. do you know where he is?

Nimble's group was attacked by some Bandits on their way back here from the Dark Valley .. There is an old Factory located on the road there, just North of here .. we think that is where they have taken him .. My men are checking it out as we speak..

He is carrying some information that is important to my current employer, and I really need to get that information from him .. so, perhaps I might be able to assist your men in getting him out of the mess that he is in...
Well, it sounds like we might be able to work out a deal then .. let's talk..
Where do I have to go?

Go see Petruha .. he's one of my top Scouts .. he, and two of his men are located just past the underpass to the North-East of here .. on the hill .. I'll radio them, and let them know that you are coming to help them...
Sounds good...
My men are expecting you .. Good luck, Marked One!!
I'll get back to you on this...
Fine, get lost then!!
So, how is it going?
I managed to free Nimble from the Factory..
So I've heard!! .. you're not the average Rookie that I thought you were .. here, take this as a token of my appreciation for a job well done!!
The Factory has been cleared of all the Bandits..
My men have told me all about it!! Here, take this money... you've earned it .. Also, here's a little something for you...
Hey there
Still working on it..
Keep me posted, ok?
I can't waste time on idle chit-chat. Take a hike.
Understood .. Sorry..
Hello, Marked One. What's up with you?
Any news for me, Marked One?
Pretty simple really .. Those bandits aren't exactly trained fighters, are they?!
Ha Ha!! .. well, you certainly took care of things .. Here, take this as a reward...
Thanks, Brother!! You saved my life!! I don't even know how to begin thanking you!!...
No problem .. I need that Flash-Drive you were taking to Sidorovich. Do you still have it!?
Yeah, I still have it... Those morons didn't even search me that well .. Here, take it!! I don't want the responsibility any more ..
Thanks. Where did you hide it so that they couldn't find it?

I've been working for Sid for a long time now, and I know that the information he sometimes sends me to get is quite valuable to the wrong kind of people .. so, I know where to hide things so that they cannot be found .. you are probably better off not knowing where I stashed it .. just make sure you wash your hands ... lol!! .. By the way, I told those Assholes a nice little story about a cache full of Artefacts, and they sent someone off to check it .. he probably got eaten by some Boars anyways .. The cache does exist, but there is only one Artefact left in it. As a reward .. I can give you it's coordinates!!
Stay safe, Marked-One!!
That would be great, Thanks..

Be careful .. there are a lot of mutants around there .. and, if the guy they sent there is still alive, he is armed with a bit more than a shovel, and I'm sure as hell that he won't be happy to see you!!
Sure thing .. Thanks!!
Sure, no problem. Good luck!!
Mission accomplished .. Here's the box from the Army Outpost

You never cease to amaze me Marked One!! Hmmm, I cant read this encrypted mess ... Take the box up to the Barkeep in Rostok, he's got some people that specialize in this sort of thing .. his Nerd Squad, I call them .. lol!! Apparently, there is supposed to be some very valuable information here, so it is important that you get it to him in one piece!! .. Are you up for it?!
Sure thing .. I'll do it..
No thanks .. not interested..
Well, I'll find someone else then .. someone who actually wants to get rich...
Have you got any more Special missions for me?
Nope, not a thing at the moment..
Finish the job I've already given you first .. then we can talk...

Well, here's the deal then... a document case containing the confidential field reports made by a Scientific Expedition that went deep into the Zone has been confiscated by the Military. It awaits further transport South at the Army Outpost just south of here...
Ok .. I'm listening...

I want you to sneak into the Outpost, and recover the Case... bring it to me here, and I will have a look at the contents, and determine what to do next... Do this for me, and I will ensure that you are well compensated... Are you interested?
Consider it done...

I'll get the cash ready - don't let me down, Marked One!! .. And one other thing .. keep it as low profile as possible .. we don't need the Military getting wind of the fact that a respectable Businessman such as myself would stoop so low as to hire such a lowly thief in order steal such important information from them... go in at night, when they are off their guard, and head-first into the Vodka I continuously supply them with... It will be the your only chance!!
Yes, I have such a thing.
Damn, no... why would I have one of those?
Very good. Military Uazik waiting for you around the farm, south of the broken bridge... Now go and get my case.
I'll try.
Then find for him the Perfect Beryl-5M.
Okay, I will try to find your Armor.
I cannot do this job just yet...
C'mon man, it's not as bad as it sounds .. a bunch of drunk recruits, green as grass with a single Commanding Officer over them .. I'm disappointed in you .. I really am!!
Listen, Marked One... I've done some thinking, and here's what I'd like to offer... Generally speaking, your main objective is to find this Strelok character... correct?
Yes, I suppose so... continue...

Anyway, here's the thing .. about Strelok... The rumors are that he's managed to find a way into the northern reaches of the Zone. Dangerous place, but a real goldmine for Artefacts .. Yeah... Anyway, I can help you find him .. this Stalker... However, as you can well imagine, it won't be a free ride. You'll have to work for it .. work for me, that is .. In the long run, we will both benefit from this arrangement: You're going to waste that Strelok fella, and find out who you are, and what's happened to you... And I'll find... well, I mean... I'll get my share of our mutual profits... whad'ya say...
I'm still listening...

Alright, listen... You mean business, I can see that... And I... I mean, we need guys like you. The people I work for are conducting an inside investigation of sorts with myself, and some other trusted Traders. We want to open up the path to the North, to the center of the Zone. And somewhere near the center, someone or something is interfering with our progress... How the heck this Strelok person managed to get through is beyond me... You see, there's this one area where your brain starts boiling. An eerie place... Anyway, to make a long story short - a couple of guys have been spying on those Grunts for me, not far from here. Apparently, the Soldiers at the Agroprom Research Institute have dug something up. Something Big. I'm positive it has to do with us, and our efforts to penetrate deeper into the Zone. Anyway, whatever they've dug up, it's being held somewhere on the third floor of the Institute. We really need this information, Marked One .. as I'm sure you can understand ...
I think so, yes...

Once you have the briefcase, don't bring it here. Take it straight to the Barkeep in Rostok .. he runs the 100*Rads Bar up there as a front for our other business endeavours .. I'll input the coordinates, and all other information that you need into your PDA ... Good Luck!!
Sounds like a plan...

You'll have to go North through the Dump, then turn West. You'll end up at the Agroprom Research Institute after a few kilometers. And be careful, the radiation level is off the charts in the Dump area .. so, I suggest you cough up for some anti-radiation drugs, or some vodka, Good Luck!!

Got a job for you, Marked One... I want you to find a Stalker called Nimble, he was carrying some very important information for me on a flash drive. He disappeared somewhere along his way back from the Dark valley. Find him, dead or alive - I don't care, I need the flash drive with the information on it .. intact!!. Go see Wolf here in the Village... He might know where to start looking for Nimble .. if he hasn't located him already, that is...
Is that it?
Hey Marked One, what's up?
Marked One, what are you doing here?! I told you to find Nimble!!
So, you paid X-18 a visit, did you?! Did you get the documents!?
Yeah. Here they are..

Well, well... I see... Now that's interesting, very interesting! If I told anyone they wouldn't believe me! Hmm... Yeah... Oh! Would you just look at that! I didn't expect this... it's pretty bad, eh... Well, here take these back and give them to the Barkeep. Oh, and I owe you for your efforts.. here you go...

Wait. Here, take this pistol and some ammunition .. You won't last two seconds in the Zone without a weapon! By the way, when you were brought here, you had a knife on you. I took it off you just in case your head wasn't screwed on straight .. You look okay now though, so here, I'll give it back to you...
Thank you for keeping it safe for me...
Well, Marked One? Any news for me?!

You're going to need some supplies, and some money .. So, for the time being Marked One, you are going to work for me .. it's not as if you have any other choice in the matter.. do we understand each other?
Well.. what can I do you out of today, Marked One?
I can't remember anything ... start with the basics..
And what kind of work would you have me do!?

One of my employees named Nimble was returning from an important job .. He has disappeared somewhere this side of the bridge to the North .. I do not know what to make of it, really .. In short: find Nimble, dead or alive .. doesn't matter .. He is one of Wolf's men .. talk to him here in the Village .. he probably knows something useful. He might even give you some equipment for the job!!
Anything else I should know?
That's all for now. Bring me the Flash-Drive, and we'll take it from there...
I'll see what I can do...
If you want to earn some more money .. I might be able to help you...
And how might that be?
I need some help finding a particular Artefact. I'll pay you well...
Where should I begin searching for such an Artefact?
I couldn't be bothered searching for Artefacts...
I have a client from the South that has requested a Night Star artefact .. If you bring one to me, I'll give you a fair amount of money for it...
Night Star artefact, huh? .. I'll see what I can do for you...
Any luck finding me that Artefact?!
Here it is .. a very strange, and wonderous thing...
Nothing yet .. sorry..
Excellent work!! .. here is your reward...
Thank you kindly!!
Hey, Marked One .. Nice to see that you are still alive...
Greetings, Marked One! How did you make out?!
Mission accomplished .. Here's the Artefact...
Great, Marked One. One more little favor...
And what might this favour be!?
I've got Nimble's Flash Drive for you...
Where's the Flash-Drive!?
Here it is...
Fantastic!! Great Work!!
I don't have it yet...
That's a pity, Marked One, a real pity. We can't talk business until you bring it to me...
Here you go .. take it...
Good .. Consider yourself employed .. I'd suggest you avoid going to the Rookie Camp...
Nothing yet, I'm afraid...
So, did you bring me the Artefact?
No, not yet...
Well, until you bring it to me, we've got nothing to talk about... Get to it man!!
Marked One, I've told you everything you need to know already. Get out of here!!
So Marked One, any news?!
I need answers to a few questions...
What is it that you want to know? .. ask away...
Tell me about the Zone in general..
Go ahead, and ask...
What role does the Army serve here in the Zone?!

No one really knows if they are guarding the entrance to the Zone, or protecting the rest of the world from it. Sometimes they send whole expeditions here to look for something... But I'll tell you one thing: they don't respect the Zone, and the Zone doesn't like them much in return .. That's why they send so many of their own home in body bags so often. They look down their noses at everyone else, and act as if they are something special put here on the planet to protect us lowly civilians. They have no respect for Stalkers' rules of conduct, and wouldn't piss on you if you were set on fire in front of them! They will shoot you on sight, without reprimand from their Superiors... I've got a few inside contacts among them...you know, people always need Vodka and...umm, magazines, right?! My advice to you is to simply stay away from them .. and you might live to see another day here in the Zone!!
What else can you tell me about the Zone?..

It's not just a circle a few kilometers in diameter with a Nuclear Power Plant at it's epicenter... It's much more than that!!! It is truly something exremely bizarre .. and wonderful at the same time. I doubt anyone in the world could give you a straight answer. I feel that the Zone isn't even part of this world. It's a different, detached world, weird and dangerous... and attractive, too. And you know why? Because with a little luck .. anyone can get rich here. And the closer you come to the center of the Zone, the higher you will climb on the money ladder!!!
What's so dangerous about this Different World?!

Here, a Soldier's stray bullet is the least of your worries .. Getting shot is basically the most painless kind of death in the Zone. Anomalies, now that's something for you... To die in an anomaly is a terrible thing indeed. Even mutants try to keep away from them. By the way, mutants, these Children of the Zone, are another kind of trouble entirely .. so don't go anywhere unarmed, and without suitable protection. Just ask any Stalker, they will tell you!!
How does one get rich around here, then?!

Artefacts!! .. that's the single, most important thing here... All sorts of weird toys that come from the Zone are worth a fortune outside the perimeter. Artefacts are more precious than gold, diamonds or pure plutonium. Why!? Because, no jewelry in the world can give you the supernatural powers that the artefacts possess. Just imagine: you can hang a little gadget on your belt that makes bullets swerve by and never hit you!! .. You can even find bits, and pieces even just around here in the Cordon. For the most valuable pieces though, you'll have to get closer to the center .. to the North .. where it's dangerous!!
Does anyone actually know what's happening in the center of the Zone!?

It's a different tale every time you hear it .. except I don't believe all that other-worldly nonsense. The one thing I do believe is that the center of the Zone contains a lot of valuable Artefacts!! Only I haven't met anyone yet that has gone there, and managed to make it back in one piece .. and then you came along!!!
Do you know what happened to me!?

A Stalker known as the Astrologer found you near the wreckage of a Death Truck, which is a... a kind of corpse carrier of sorts, right?! These trucks come down from the center of the Zone once in a while, loaded up with bodies. No one really knows where they are heading, but the Military don't ask questions .. they just wave them through the gate .. wanting to get rid of them as fast as possible, I would imagine .. Last night there was a terrible storm .. thunder, and lightning, and all that .. well, this truck you were in was struck by a bolt of lightning, and literally burst into flames .. it flipped over a couple of times, and finally came to rest off to the side of the road. The Astrologer was on his way from the Dump to meet his associate, the Swamp Doctor at the ruined farm north of the fallen bridge. He came across the wreckage, and upon searching it .. he found you .. He saved your life Marked One, and for that you should be thankfull!! That is all we know so far .. you are simply going to have to find things out for yourself...
Who is this 'Strelok' person anyways!?

Rumor has it that he is one of the few Stalkers that has ever made it to the center of the Zone, and back. I've never dealt with him personally, myself .. as it appears that he has certain trading channels of his own .. You will have to ask around about him to learn more .. I'm sure that someone is bound to have some useful information...
What is this I hear about a 'Phantom' Stalker being witnessed?!
Heh, that's another local legend. We haven't had any news about him for a long time. I suppose he probably perished somewhere deep within the Zone...
What's going on in this neck of the woods?

This is the entrance to the Zone .. It's relatively quiet, with the exception of a couple of Army guys who like to have some fun, go on shakedown runs. Experienced Stalkers don't come by very often, so it's mostly Rookies. Watch yourself though, as they aren't afraid to pull the trigger when push comes to shove. There's a deserted Factory across the road. To the North, behind the railroad embankment there are the ruins of an old farm .. an Army Outpost lies directly to the South of here .. so, be careful .. it's surrounded by land mines, and the road leading to it is patrolled diligently both day, and night. There is another small Army Outpost to the North, just under the fallen railway bridge .. That's about it, really ...
Tell me more about the Army Outpost...

The Soldiers stationed there have been ordered to shoot on sight .. so you are best advised to stay away from there. If you piss them off, they call for the Spetsnaz Units from the North. Those guys don't mess around .. they are the ones flying helicopters all over the place .. patrolling the Zone as if it actually belonged to them .. They can stir up such a shitstorm that I wouldn't have any bloody customers for months .. I know the Commander a little: he likes to take a swig of Vodka as much as the next man. I'm surviving here, thanks to him, and his filthy habits!!!
I want to know more about the fallen railway bridge...

That's just a couple of minutes North of here .. you can't miss it. Once a railway bridge that spanned the main road, it collapsed during an extremely powerful 'Blowout' The Military built a checkpoint there and don't let anyone through... but if you grease the right palm, you'll pass with no problems. In general, you don't want to show your face there too much, unless you are prepared to part with Vodka and, or money...
What about the Factory?

Heading north along the road, you'll see a collection of brick buildings to the East - that's it. Everything worth scavenging has already been taken .. soi don't even bother looking. Bandits seem to like this place, and often setup Camp there on a regular basis. I don't know if there are any of them camped out there now, but be careful going past .. just in case. You may not have anything of value on you at the moment, but you really don't wanna go through all that crap with those Assholes!!!
and the old farmstead?..
You're getting boring, you know that? It's just an old, abandoned farm... nothing more.
Thanks for the information...
I'd like to know more...
Tell me about this place...

This is the entrance to the Zone .. It's relatively quiet, with the exception of a couple of Army guys who like to have some fun, go on shakedown runs. Experienced Stalkers don't come by very often, so it's mostly Rookies. Watch yourself though, as they aren't afraid to pull the trigger when push comes to shove. There's a deserted Factory across the road. To the North, behind the railroad embankment there are the ruins of an old farm .. an Army Outpost lies directly to the South of here .. so, be careful .. it's surrounded by land mines, and the road leading to it is patrolled diligently both day, and night. There is another small Army Outpost to the North, just under the fallen railway bridge .. That's about it, really ...
Ok.. thanks..
Tell me more about the Army Outpost...

The Soldiers stationed there have been ordered to shoot on sight .. so you are best advised to stay away from there. If you piss them off, they call for the Spetsnaz Units from the North. Those guys don't mess around .. they are the ones flying helicopters all over the place .. patrolling the Zone as if it actually belonged to them .. They can stir up such a shitstorm that I wouldn't have any bloody customers for months .. I know the Commander a little: he likes to take a swig of Vodka as much as the next man. I'm surviving here, thanks to him, and his filthy habits!!!
I want to know more about the fallen railway bridge...

That's just a couple of minutes North of here .. you can't miss it. Once a railway bridge that spanned the main road, it collapsed during an extremely powerful 'Blowout' The Military built a checkpoint there and don't let anyone through... but if you grease the right palm, you'll pass with no problems. In general, you don't want to show your face there too much, unless you are prepared to part with Vodka and, or money...
What about the Factory?

Heading north along the road, you'll see a collection of brick buildings to the East - that's it. Everything worth scavenging has already been taken .. soi don't even bother looking. Bandits seem to like this place, and often setup Camp there on a regular basis. I don't know if there are any of them camped out there now, but be careful going past .. just in case. You may not have anything of value on you at the moment, but you really don't wanna go through all that crap with those Assholes!!!
and the old farmstead?..
You're getting boring, you know that? It's just an old, abandoned farm... nothing more.
I'm ok... bleeding all over though. Gimme a medkit, will ya?
Thanks, Brother!!
Here you are...
Thanks!! .. If you had not come along .. I'd be dead!!
What the hell happened to you!?

We were coming back from a job in the Dark Valley for Sidorovich .. came across some Bandits .. One of our guys got killed right over there .. he didn't stand a chance!! They grabbed Nimble because he tried to bribe them with some information about a cache full of Artefacts. One of them whacked me with the butt-end of his TOZ, must have knocked me out cold .. that's all I remember!!
I'm going to see if I can rescue 'Nimble' right now .. you coming?!

Oh, man... the way I feel right now, I'd be of no use to you at all .. I've got to get some of my strength back .. I'm going to drag my ass back to the Village .. Sid's gonna be pissed!! I'll let everyone know how much you helped me!! Thanks again!!
Fair enough then ..
I don't have a medkit .. Sorry..
Search the body over there... I think that poor guy had one...
Not great, but I'll live .. I need to get my ass back to the Village...
Oh man .. please help .. the pain is too much!!
You still alive, man!?
Ughh.. help me.. please..
Are you Okay?
What's the matter?! you seem spooked, or something...

I still can't forget what happened recently. Just listen to this. Once I was walking towards the Garbage, it was dark already. And to be honest, I was really drunk. I decided not to walk around the Zone at night as I could get into an anomaly or some bloody dogs could smell me. I knew I had to find a safe place to sleep for the night. I saw some old, abandoned house, everything was pretty quiet... So I lit a match and headed inside it. I saw a flight of stairs and decided to head up them. I remember there was a hole in the roof where I could see the full moon, and the night sky. The room was full of rags, rubbish, old clothes, a real mess. But it seemed safe, I sat under the whole in the roof, the moon calmed me down, and I fell asleep after a while. Im a light sleeper though... Suddenly I jerked awake, It was pitch black in the house except for a patch on the floor where the moon shined through the hole in the roof, I could just feel something was wrong, and suddenly I heard a faint, gurgling growl... I looked over my arm slowly, And there I saw it... A Bloodsucker, sleeping... He was on the other side of the room, with his back to me, my heart pounded, I didn't know what to do, surely he'd hear the steps creak and wake up... So I laid back down, afraid to move a muscle.
Well, what happened next?

I laid for a while trying to clear my head and think, but it's not easy with something like a Bloodsucker sleeping right next to you! I wondered why it hadn't attacked me, maybe it didn't see me, I don't know. I had to get out of the house though, I had a gun in my bag, but I'd have to crawl to get it, and frankly, I didn't wan't to wake it. I laid down and tried to draw up some courage, I had no choice, I had to do something, I got up slowly, and grabbed my bag, but I stepped on a loose floorboard, and the Bloodsucker jumped, it was awake, I could tell, it's breathing had turned quiet, he was listening for me, he knew he wasn't alone. I made a reach for the bag fast. When the beast heard the noise it jumped up, I managed to pull out my pistol and fire a shot into its chest, I wondered If I had killed it, I soon got my answer, the beast jumped out of the shadows at me, Im not sure how it happened, but It's ugly head wen't through the loop in my rucksack and got stuck, I took off the rucksack and fire a round into its leg, and climbed through the hole in the roof, it tried to follow but it still had the rucksack around his head, and it was pretty full of junk, he looked stuck, it roared and waved its arms trying to free itself. I had a lot of good stuff in it though...
You're lucky you got out of there alive...
I guess so, but it sucks that I lost my rucksack!!
How are you doing?

Im doing alright, If that's even possible here in the Zone... I heard a story some time ago about a forest surrounding the Psi-Emitter, they say inside it lived the most powerful and good-natured Controller in the Zone. He had never killed anyone, unless it was to save his own life, he usually hid from anybody who happened to come across him, so that no one would open fire on him, people say he's been living off of those mutant dogs. Anyways, they said that the Military was sweeping the area, trying to clean the forest up from the dogs by gunning down the puppies and anything else they could find, they said there were too many of them there. After the clean-up, supposedly only one ugly blind puppy remained. Maybe some more have managed to survive though, anyways, they say this controller was walking through the forest, and found this deformed puppy. The controller took pity in the ugly puppy, and from that point on, the pup was always in the Controllers presence... He raised it, shared his food with it, became the puppies parent. Can you imagine that? A good-natured Controller?
Well, what happened then?

The two became best friends, they were inseperable! If the Controller went somewhere, the dog was always trotting beside him, they'd venture all around the forest, neither the controller or the puppy have ever openly attacked anyone, nor has anybody bothered the two creatures - however, on a patrol through the forest, some mercenaries had spotted the controller resting against a tree, they opened fire on him. They say the Controller held off the soldiers just long enough for the faithful pup to get to safety, but among the mercenary force were very accurate soldiers, and the bullets had found their mark. The controller hit the ground, it became quiet...
How sad, what happened then?

The Controller laid there on the ground, the soil becoming moist and drenched in his blood, he died shorty after... After things calmed down, the dog made his way back to his best friend, who lay dead on the forest floor, it became late and still the dog remained, howling for his best friend, even rain couldn't drown out his cries, weeks and weeks wen't by and the dog howled, but eventually it became quiet. Some people eventually ventured into the forest, some claimed they found the Controllers skeleton, and the puppys as well, they died together, inseperable to the end.
Thats one of the strangest things I've ever heard...
Hey Fox, tell me a story...

Okay, I had an adventure of sorts... It was before supper, I had just passed the Army post. You know, they are really cheeky these days, they let us pass, but took a lot of money. I had some loot on me and I didn't want a fight, so I payed them. But I was hungry, so hungry I couldn't even wait 'till the rookie camp, so I sat down under a tree and started taking some food out of my rucksack. I won't lie, I had some vodka on me as well... So, I put all that stuff on a newspaper, looked around - birds flying, sun shining... As soon as I opened a can of meat I noticed some rookies about 300 hundred meters away. Well, I put the meat away and grabbed my shotgun, decided to come closer to them. It seemed as though they were coming from the Garbage. Well, they could only do that by finding a hole in the fence... I took out my binoculars, I though it could be one of our guys. But no, these were those Damn vultures, Bandits. And I thought: Bloody hell! They are going towards the village!. And it was becoming dark... I realized they wanted to be unexpected. And all I had on me was just a shotgun. I couldn't get to the village before them as they were quite far. Well, I thought: Now it's my turn to die. At least I'll die a real Stalker's death., I told myself.
Then what happened?

Well, I remembered that I had a grenade in my rucksack! I don't like those things - I take them out and I realize that it's someone's death, and if you're not agile enough - your own death. But I was there with nothing else I could do and the situation was pretty serious... So I took it out, put my rucksack on the grass and ran after the Bandits. They had their backs turned at me and I was wearing my trainers, so they didn't hear me. Hiding behind trees and bushes I got about ten meters closer to them. I heard them talking. They were very stupid, staying in a big group... Well, I thought: You haven't much longer to live, being this close. So I threw the grenade right into the middle of their group! Believe it or not, I got five of them with it, only two were left. One shot at me with his shotgun, but he was disorientated and got his friend instead of me. And I didn't let him get away with that. While he was reloading his shotgun, I got him with my knife. I'm no Indian, but I can throw a knife from two meters away... You don't believe me, do you? If you want to see for yourself, come with me. If I get that tree there - you owe me a bottle of vodka. Yeah though, tactics are a big deal. Imagine me going against them with just a shotgun.
Yes, grenades they are quite useful at times.
It's so boring in the Cordon, got any stories to tell?

I've got a few stories I can tell... Once I came to Sidorovitch's and he told me some foreign tourist was coming to take some photos and see the Zone... He said I needed to organize his trip in the Zone, show him some anomalies, you know, that kind of stuff. And I really needed money at the moment, I had no ammo for my Kalashnikov, shotgun was beat to hell, only had a pistol with blank bullets in the chamber... So, I agreed to give the guy a tour. Not very far, of course, just around the village. So anyways, the guy showed up. In sunglasses, with a camera. Speaking English and smiling like a bastard. Came for a freaking safari. I gestured him to follow. We didn't go very far - our guys just had cleared all the territory before the mill.
Yeah, what happened then?

So, we got to this little hangar, you know, where Fedya Constructor had died? Be quiet, I told the guy, We are going for some Zombies. He got the atmosphere of the moment, his eyes became really big and he took out a bloody Magnum from his rucksack. Fucking hell!, I thought. No, put that gun away, I told him, and I gestured him to follow me. It was dark, nothing visible at all... Water was dripping distantly, windows giving all kinds of wierd sounds, I had nothing to fear though, as you will see. The tourist was shivering and scared out of his mind. Suddenly, a Zombie in camouflage comes out of the darkness and starts walking towards us. The foreigner booked before I even told him to run. Me and the Zombie couldn't hold in the laughter! Petrovich, the so called Zombie, really scared the shit of the client... Took it a bit too far you could say, cause' I was supposed to shoot him with some blanks for realism... Wasn't quick enough though, the tourist took off! It seems as though the tourist has heard of the zombified ones, but as soon as he heard the howling and the guy walking towards us... Well, we got a good amount of money that time.
Yeah, that's funny!
Hey, anything interesting happen recently?

Listen to this, I was walking through the Dump, it was quite peaceful, but then I noticed there was a dent in the ground, like a Springboard. So, I threw a bolt at it and I was really shocked! It went through that thing without anything happening! Well, I thought it was my mind playing tricks on me, thought I'd drunk a bit too much
Yeah, you must've drank to much...

No, what are you talking about? It looked exactly like one, you should know what I'm talking about, it looked exactly like a Springboard! The ground was lighter, a bit squished on top and some stones pushed into it. The wind was blowing towards it, too
Well, maybe it could've been..
So, I sat down, picked up a little stone up from the ground and threw it straight into the Springboard
And It got crushed into dust?

That's what I was hoping to see. But no, the stone just just fell to the ground as though there was no anomaly there. Just fell and that's it. It bugged me, I started to sweat a little. The bolts and the stones should've been destroyed, I figured it had to be a Spec! Anyways, quietly crouching I edged near the Springboard, still throwing stones at it to see what would happen
Come on, get on with it.

Well, I got right next to it. I was sweatin' up a storm, thinking I was about to be pulled of my feet and crushed to death... But the stones that I threw were right in the middle of the Springboard. A voice in my head was telling me to get out of there as quick as possible! Yet I didn't. A Spec... I had to understand what was happening.
Be serious, If you had went any closer, you wouldn't be standing here.
But I am. Anyways, I put my weapon on my lap and I reached for one of the stones in the Springboard! So I took it out. It was just like a normal stone
I don't believe it. Tell me what really happened.

Well, to my surprise, I was thrown about five meters away from the Springboard. Shouldn't have touched that stone I guess. The Springboard started working, damn thing. While I was up in the air I could see all the stones getting crushed into dust. When I hit the ground, I became unconscious.
No way! You had too much to drink.
No, Im telling you! Just look at this stone, here!
That is kinda wierd, It's hard to believe... But I tell you, your curiosity will kill you one day.
What do you think about the Zone?

I have a theory... Not even really a theory, just an idea... What if all this - everything In the Zone, is just some weird experiment on people? Maybe some gray's came down in their UFO's and created it... What? This theory isn't much worse than others... It's interesting: if this is some sort of a experiment, what could they be testing here? Checking perhaps, which artefacts we like better? Maybe all these artefacts are bombs, or alien eggs. And we're spreading them all around the world, in all these laboratories, with rich people buying them... Think about it... I like that idea! Hey I just bought some weird thing, from some place called The Zone, paid a lot of money for it too. I guess that makes us cooler then everyone else!. And then one day just fucking blows up in their face! Ha-ha... But to be serious, hell knows what they really are... Only those, who've been past the Radar, could know something. Well, maybe they know, but they aren't very talkative, are they? Only moan. Maybe that's why... Uh, nevermind... That's not funny at all...
Yeah, that's quite sad, Come on, brother, let's drink some vodka.
That's a good idea, otherwise more of these weird thoughts come into my head...
Why aren't there any foreigners in the Zone?

Okay, I'll answer your question. First of all, why do they need to get in here themselves when they could give a grant to our scientists and they could bring all the results straight to them? Second, to be honest, there were many foreigners here once. It's only the last two years they were afraid to come here... They had a massive failure here. Now all they do is buy materials and information. They pay decent amounts of money though, so many Stalkers work for them, Those damned Bandits as well... You really haven't you heard of that story?
What story?

You're incredible Marked One! The entire Zone was keeping their ears to the ground about this and you're just now crawling from under the rock... Oh right, your amnesia... Sorry, I forgot. All in all it was a big arrangement. Scientists alone were counting over 30 heads from all over the world, best of the best, all of them... They went through some serious preparations: They had a lot of equipment and were crapping money like there's no tomorrow. Took a platoon of Military specialists for security and three of our guides, loaded everything into shielded BTRs and went off. Well, came back a week later... Found a dozen people in a totally thrashed BTR. Showed up at the fence around the Red forest, straight into the arms of the welcoming party... Bandits, Yeah, their kind don't give a shit what these people been through... Nearly everyone got gunned down. Only three of them have managed to break through the perimeter, two of ours and one egghead. The fella had quite a few screws going loose, so they've quickly hooked him up for a treatment. He's writing a book about the Zone now. Our guys were in a better shape, experience must be worth something. Although they've probably shared their toll as well: one of them went towards the Radar, never to be seen again, and the other one, well, he moved to the Big land. The rest were consumed by the Zone.
That was some expedition...

Yeah, it was a complete failure. Have you heard of Town-32? That's where they disappeared. To start off, everything was relatively alright, they were making some researches there, examining anomalies and things like that, But then something wierd started happening, people slowly started to go crazy. Our guy, the one that went to rest, had told me... Some of them just started to scratch their throat open with their nails, others smashed their heads against walls, then some took the easy way out and stuck a gun into their mouth, and then mutants started to attack, people who were still able to think locked themselves up houses. Can you imagine? Outside its pitch black and all these creatures are running amock with people losing their minds one by one. So, in the morning those who didn't go mad had got out of there somehow. The way back was rough, they weren't even following the road, ran through a few anomalies I'd imagine, they got to the Rotten Forest, and those who were left there were never found. Some guys say that the number of Controllers has increased in that area. Since then no one goes into Town-32, If you happen to visit Yantar, ask our scientist Sakharov about it, he was connected to that expedition.
What happened to you? What were those things we just killed?

Mutants... Blind dogs, those damned white-furred ones... They're wierd, I was shooting at them and it looked like they didn't give a damn... Looks like they don't feel much pain. I was walking from the Garbage after talking to my brother, Seriy and they started following me from the woods. I was walking and the woods were dark, I couldn't see anything because of the damn trees. Suddenly, something white shot out of a bush and bit me in the stomach... I didn't even feel the pain, so I shot the dog and tricked the other half of its pack into a Springboard, ran here, shot a couple more of them... Then I saw a big puddle of blood on the ground... When I bent down a part of my armor fell out of the wound and the blood just started to pour out... They've got bloody good teeth... I've been told of chimeras, and their teeth are even sharper and they'll jump at you as well... I can't thank you enough for helping me out, I really owe you one!
No problem, Fox, I'm just glad I could help...
What's with all the mutants around here?

It's mostly just dogs, but theres a lot of wild boars nearby, be careful. If you meet just one, don't be scared, dodge to the side when it charges, it's not hard, then turn right around and shoot it. That's one less boar in the world. But if there are several of them this tactic might not work. But hey, I warned you...
Thanks for the advice.
What happened to your jacket?

You wan't to know what happened? Well after I bought the jacket, I realized I was fresh outta cash, so I decided to go out and find some loot. There is lots of places to find money in the Garbage. Without some special protection you'd be dead quite soon though. And I never have had that protection, so my little journey completely failed. I only had an ordinary jacket, and it was full of holes and burns. Where could a rookie get some good protection? The gunshots in the Garbage were still audible, there was a fierce gunfight there. Stalkers were protectiong their camp from arriving bandits. So I was caught in the crossfire: radiation and bandits. So I chose the lesser of two evils. Obviously, I chose the bandits, heavily armed, bloodthirsty and in need for some loot. I had a chance to skip them, but I stood no chance against radiation. You should've seen where I was! I was hiding behind a tree and an expensive artefact was just two steps away from me, but if I started walking to it I'd be dead the same minute, I guarantee it! So I was sitting there under the tree, listening to the gunshots and sounds of the Zone. I had to make a plan of how to get out of there alive and relatively unharmed. My rucksack was thin as a bloodsucker's victim. Only half-full bottle of vodka and two loaves of bread were inside it. I had no ammo so in rage I threw my gun into an anomaly. It quickly shattered in less than a second. I was sitting and thinking there for a long time afterwards. More than an hour. The bandits couldn't see me so I was quietly sitting and thinking. Then I took out my bottle of vodka and some bread. When I took a sip I felt bitterness in my mouth, so I took a big bite of bread. That's how I finished the whole bottle. Suddenly I felt a headache and my eyes blurred. I stood up and ran to the middle of the road like a fool, shaking my hands and my arse.
Damn, are you insane!? Or just suicidal!?

It was so weird... I couldn't control myself then. Suddenly something made me run to the gates, which lead to the barn, where bandits and stalkers were fighting. I was running and shouting, but I can't remember what. I was also hopping at the same time, like a little kid. Five bandits with shotguns were just staring at me. I stopped and I couldn't even see them properly, just looked at each one of them with my hands up in the air. With fives gun pointed at me I quickly gained my mind back. I nearly shit myself as well. So, someone smacked me with a the butt end of a shotgun from behind my back and I fell to the ground, still conscious. Then I felt another hit. I was so surprised when I woke up alive near the camp. But those bastards had taken my jacket and I had a terrible headache. But I was alive! I was very happy for that. Without thinking I wen't towards the camp. When people there saw me, they were shocked - I was alive and almost unharmed straight from the bandits. Since then I'm done with long and dangerous expeditions, only walk near the camp and kill dogs, and earn small amounts of money. I tell you, don't go to the Garbage unless you really need to, it's a very dangerous and deadly place. It's a pity I lost that jacket, it was brand new...
Nimble, that'll teach you not to drink too much vodka... Remember these words, It'll bring you to your death one day and Bandits might not be so merciful next time.
Yeah Yeah .. you sound just like my ex-wife!!!
I dont remember seeing you around here before...
My name is Kostya.. and who are you?!

Well, they have been calling me Marked One on account of this tattoo... I don't know who I really am at all .. I was found .. there was an ... um .. accident .. I'm still trying to piece it all together...
Well then .. Marked One it is .. How's life in the Zone been treating you so far then?..
Not so good, to be honest...
Why not?!
Ive started working for Sidorovich .. not that I have much choice .. He sent me on a suicide mission armed only with this crappy Makarov .. the thing barely fires at all anymore!!!
that sounds like Sid .. he likes to take advantage when he can... so, what happened?!
I managed to take out a group of Bandits at the old Factory .. just luck, really .. I really need to get my hands on some better equipment .. and soon!!

Dont let Sid fool you .. he's not the only one around that has work for guys like you!! I've got some information on a hidden Bandit stash. If you agree to go find it for me, I will cut you in on the loot!! .. Just bring it all to me first, and we'll split it between us .. How does that sound Brother!?
Sure thing, where do I start looking for it?!
I'll send the information to you via text message on your PDA .. I have to meet some people at the Dump. If you need me, I'll be there for a little while...
Sounds good .. Thanks!!
Should I just rip off your head now, or wait a bit!?
What the hell are you talking about? what happened!?
You sent me to find Nimble with nothing but a busted up Makarov to defend myself with!!

Listen up, Marked One .. and listen good!! There are no easy jobs here!!. You arrive here withy nothing but the clothes on your back, and I offer you some paying work .. That's more than I have to do at all .. Maybe you'd like to return to the Death Truck where the Astrologer found you?! ... That CAN be arranged, you know .. so don't you fuck with me .. Ok?!
I appreciate it .. but, can you at least give me a REAL gun?!
What's wrong with the Makarov?! .. it's a fine weapon .. perhaps if you learned to shoot straight, things wouldn't be so difficult for you .. lol!! .. So, do you want it? or not!
I can scavange better weapons than what your trying to get me killed with!!..
That attitude is going to get you killed Marked One!! Keep the ammo then, and get the hell out of here!!
Kiss my ass Sidorovich .. a pleasure doing business with you!!
I found your stash...
Excellent work .. Anything interesting inside?!
Some decent equipment .. and a dented up PDA . I couldn't get anything from it, as it requires a password, or something .. Here, you might as well take it .. it's no use to me...
Give it here .. that's the part of the Stash I was looking for!!!
Thanks for the tip-off on the Stash...
No problem .. I'm glad that you managed to find it!!
Me too .. some decent loot!!
Ive got another job if your interested.. I need you to get a special Goldfish artefact.
Sure, Im interested .. But, I wouldn't even know where to start looking for one of those...
It is in the Cordon at the abandoned Factory. I couldn't get to it at the time .. can you try to get it for me?!
Sure thing, Kostya...
Here's the Goldfish you asked for...
Well Done! Thank you!!
Well, did you manage to decipher the PDA!?
Not yet. I need to go to the 100*Rads... Perhaps I can find someone that can help me there .. Say, I have another job, if you want it...
Absolutely...
It is said that there is a cache here in the Dump somewhere .. You don't mind a little radiation do you?!
A little dose of radiation doesnt scare me...
I will send the info to your PDA .. When you have time take a look...
I'll bring you whatever I manage to find...
That's what I'm paying you for...
See you later...
Greetings Kostya!!
Hello, Marked One! Were you able to locate the hiding place at the Dump!?
I found an interesting Backpack .. Look here!!
This is interesting, another ciphered PDA .. I will experiment with it and see what I can find out .. Check back soon!!
Talk to you soon then ... later..
Anybody looking for me?!
Kostya is looking for you .. says he needs to speak with you...
Thanks, I'll go find him..
The Barkeep told me that you were looking for me...
It took some time, but I was able to decipher those PDA's
What did you find out?!

The first PDA, the one belonging to the Bandit, has nothing particularly interesting. Just some info about an expedition to a hiding place at the Dump .. the one you already found .. The second PDA is much more interesting. It contains information on a group of Scientists who developed, and tested a brand new Device. This Device, judging by the description, is an amazing break through in transportation technology. Apparently, this Device enables the user to Teleport to any point within the Zone. The info in this PDA asserts that the Device Prototype is stored in a Laboratory located somewhere in the vicinity of the Radar. But, to get one's hands on it is no easy task!! First off, there's the Brain Scorcher. Secondly: the Code for the lock on the door, behind which lies the Device, has been divided up into separate components, and placed in different locations. In order to get the Code, it is necessary to find all of these components. It says there are five components located in five separate locations throughout the Zone... Are you at all interested in helping me locate these stashes?!
Hell yeah!! If such a device exists, we've got to get our hands on it!!

Then listen, as I have told you already .. there are 5 hiding places. In each location there is a part of the 'Code'. It is absolutely essential that you find all five pieces of the Code!!. The precise co-ordinates are not available, so I can only give you an approximate location of where to search. The first location indicated is: The Dark Valley .. inside Laboratory X-18. Look for it there!! Once you have it .. if you find it, that is ... then report back to me as soon as possible!!
This won't be easy, I dont even know where to start looking once inside the Laboratory...
This device is priceless .. it simply must be found!!
I found the first hiding place .. Here'sthe PDA...
This is excellent!! The next hiding place is on the Agroprom .. Go there .. and look carefully!!
I'll do my best!!
I found the hiding place at Agroprom .. it wasn't easy!!!
Well I don't know. As the saying goes: Anything worth doing, is never easy!!
Where do I search for the next part of the Code?
The next hiding place is in Yantar. Supposedly located somewhere inside the Factory ...
Does it say where abouts inside the Factory!?
Sorry, it doesn't actually say!!
I'll see what I can do .. Here, take the PDA from Agroprom...
I found it!!
Your becoming quite the skilled Treasure Hunter, Marked One!!
Next stop .. The Temple of Doom!! .. lol!
Well, anything is possible. The next piece of the puzzle is apparently located at the Army Warehouses..
This isn't getting any easier, is it?! Here, take the PDA from Yantar
I have found the piece of Code at the Army Warehouses!
We're almost there!! Once we find the last hiding place, we will have all the pieces of the Code .. The last segment is located right there at the Radar itself!!
at the bloody radar?! .. You've got to be kidding me, right!?
Cool down Brother! This is the last piece of the Code .. Don't give up now!!
Im not giving up, just getting a little frustrated with all this running around .. Here's the PDA from the Warehouses..
Here you are, Kostya. The last piece of the puzzle has been found!!!
Excellent work! Now we have all the components that make up the Code .. But, ...
What do you mean BUT!?...

These are the parts of the Code. we have NO idea what the code actually is... I had hoped that it would be located within the last PDA, but it's not... It only points out that the answer can be found inside the Laboratory. So it is there that you must go .. Here are the numbers which have been deciphered from all the PDA's you brought me: 9, 7, 2, 54, 61 .. By the way, since switching-off the Brain Scorcher, I'm told that now Bloodsuckers run rampant in the area surrounding the Radar .. So, be extremely careful. I believe that they are coming from inside the Lab itself!! So before you go there, you had better stock up on grenades, and ammuntion...
Thanks for the warning .. I guess I had better prepare for the worst!!
Good luck, my Friend!!
I managed to assemble the Code, and to open the Door!!
I knew you were the right man for the job!! .. Did you find anything!!? .. C'mon .. out with it man!!

I most certainly did!! The info was correct!! It is a Prototye Hand Teleport but it works just fine .. except for one small, yet significant detail .. you have no idea where it is you will end up when using it!!!
Well, as it is still a Prototype Unit, it will certainly need to be adjusted...
I will take it to Sakharov, perhaps he can help...
Good idea!! he should be able to do it!!. I have another request for you...
Yes, what is it?

Well..., for a long time now, I've been searching for a particular Artefact. They say, with it on your belt, you become almost Invincable .. I have determined that more information about it can be found in Pripyat. There are three hiding places, in one of them is a PDA with the information I require. In two other hiding places, you should find some valuable equipment. Keep the equipment for yourself, and bring me the PDA. Will you do this for me marked One!?
I haven't come this far along to start saying NO ... Give me the coordinates...
I can only give you an approximate location...
Surprise .. Surprise ...
Here you go Kostya .. the PDA you've been wanting so badly!!
Thank you Brother!!!
No problem .. I appreciate the work you have given me...
Come, we will chat .. Whatever information I can find on stashes .. I will gladly share with you!!
Sounds good Brother .. I'll be in touch!!
Good afternoon Professor .. I've brought you something quite interesting!!
I'm listening young man... go on...

I have found a 'Prototypical Hand Teleport' .. don't ask where it came from .. that's not important .. You see, the thing is .. that it needs to be adjusted .. As it stands now .. when used, it transports you to any given location at all .. you have absolutely no control over it's destination point. I need you to adjust it .. tune it .. do whatever it is you need to do in order to get it working properly ... Can you do this .. can you make this thing work properly?! I have some documentation that I found with it .. if they will help at all...

Well, Marked One, this is interesting. Let me take a look at those documents. I will have to look into the matter carefully before I can say whether or not it can be adjusted, and therefore made to work 'properly'...
Thank you, Professor ... Here it is .. and the documents as well...
Yes Marked One, while I study these documents, could you do something for me as well?!
What do you need, Professor?

For my research I require certain data that Vasiliev had stored in his PDA .. Now, he did not return from Lab X-16 when he went in to assist Ghost .. so, his PDA must still be in there as well .. I need the information off of that PDA .. Will you get it for me? .. Bring me Vasiliev's PDA whilst I study these documents, and this here Teleportation Device that you have brought for me to look at .. I would be ever so grateful!!
I will go and find the PDA while you study the documentation...
Thank you Marked One!!
Well Professor, any success?

This is simply remarkable. Having looked at the principle functionality of this Teleport, I cannot adjust it perfectly, but with the correct parts, I can certainly make it work .. now then .. did you find the PDA?!
Yes, here it is .. now, what parts do you require?!

Excellent, thank you!! .. I hope that I can extract the necessary information from it ..\nNow concerning the Teleport .. I'm going to need a Battery artefact in order to adjust this thing properly .. Bring one to me, and I will make the necessary adjustments. Other materials will be required as well .. I already have them here in the Lab, but you will have to pay me for them. I think a hundred thousand roubles should just about cover it .. agreed?
Okay, Professor, I will bring you the Battery artefact and the money...
I've brought you the Battery artefact and the 100,000 rubles...
Now I will make the necessary adjustments to the Device .. Where would you like it to transport you to?..
To the Bar area..
To the Cordon..
To Yantar..

Here, take the device, it has been adjusted to meet your specifications. But, I must remind you that a Moonlight artefact is required in order to make use of it .. The destination can fluctuate .. You will teleport to the desired location, but it is not exact. So use it accordingly, with caution, and only under extreme circumstances. Unfortunately, after being used only once, it shuts down...
Thanks a lot!! I will put it to good use... One more question before I go: can it be re-activated?!
Certainly I can .. Bring me another 'Battery' artefact, and another 100,000 rubles, and I will adjust it for you .. I will also make another Prototype of the same design if you are interested ...
This is simply remarkable. What would you require?!
The same as before .. a Battery artefact, and a hundred thousand rubles .. Science is expensive you know...
So I've noticed... Thanks for your help!!
I need another Teleport. Can you make one for me?
Certainly, for what destination?
To the the Bar..
To the the Cordon..
To Yantar..
Do your magic, Professor!!
It's all set to go .. here you are...
They are all dead now...
Thank you! If not for you, this would have ended badly for me...
Always glad to help out a fellow Stalker - Can you tell me where I can start looking for some artefacts? I'm going to need some for ammo...

I overheard one of them say that he has stashed an Artefact nearby the Rookie Village .. somewhere where there are a lot of anomalies .. Not exact information, but it's the best I can do .. Thanks again, Friend..
Thanks for the tip, I will take a look around...
